info.name: Near Infinity on Baldur's Gate Forums
AstroBryGuy's Mac OS X specific app packages of Near Infinity

changelog.entry: Fixed several bugs related to displaying false positives in check routines.
Increased speed of check and search routines on multi-core systems.
Increased speed of Mass Exporter on multi-core systems.
Enforcing specific charset when reading filenames from chitin.key.
Added a resource type "guess" routine for resources of unknown type or file extension.
Added label to ITM flags bit 12.
Check for unused files: Added check for WAV resources attached to strrefs.
Fixed a bug in resource reference fields, which didn't properly consider resources in extra directories.
Numeric input fields in structured resources allow both decimal and hexadecimal user input.
Fixed a bug in Flag fields based on IDS entries (i.e. CRE->Status flags)
Fixed jumping to line of error/warning in script resources.
A number of fixes and tweaks
